accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Brian McNeill Collection of Southern Tenant Farmers Union Memorabilia #6252 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Item 1: National Sharecroppers Fund Donation Card

scopecontent.p: Form used to send in a donation to the fund. Addressed to Dr. Eduard C. Lindeman, Chairman.

did.unittitle: Item 2: Calling for a $625 Family Annual Wage

scopecontent.p: Announcement of a meeting at Cotton Plant, Arkansas, have a guaranteed annual wage of $625 per family. Probably 1945, possibly 1951.
